example_sentences.eng_trans: go away.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: あっちへ行く

example_sentences.eng_trans: I'll go [come] there tomorrow.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: あすそちらに行きます

example_sentences.eng_trans: I must go now./(I think) I must be going now.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: もう行かないといけません

example_sentences.eng_trans: I'm coming.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 今行きます（呼ばれたときの返事）

example_sentences.eng_trans: Where do you want to go?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: どこへ行きたいですか

example_sentences.eng_trans: Does this train go to Boston?/Does this train take us to Boston?/Is this train (bound) for Boston?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: この列車はボストンまで行きますか

example_sentences.eng_trans: Go down [along] this street, and you will get to the station./This street takes you [leads (you)] to the station.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: この通りを行くと駅に出ます

example_sentences.eng_trans: He drove [walked] to school./He went to school by car [on foot].
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は車で[歩いて]学校へ行った

example_sentences.eng_trans: I flew (over) to Tokyo./I went to Tokyo by plane./I took a plane to Tokyo.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 私は東京へ飛行機で行きました

example_sentences.eng_trans: He's going (to go) to New York.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼はニューヨークに行くつもりだ

example_sentences.eng_trans: When will you leave for America?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: いつアメリカへ行きますか（＝出発しますか）

example_sentences.eng_trans: Did you go to [attend] the last class reunion?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: この前のクラス会へは行きましたか（＝出席しましたか）

example_sentences.eng_trans: I'll come over [come to your house, visit you] next Sunday.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 次の日曜日君のところへ行くよ

example_sentences.eng_trans: Have you ever been [Have you ever gone] to England?/Did you ever go to England?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 英国へ行ったことがありますか

example_sentences.eng_trans: Go and see [Go see] him right away.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: すぐ彼のところへ行きなさい

example_sentences.eng_trans: Could you tell [show] me how to get to the station?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 駅へ行く道（＝行き方）を教えてくれませんか

example_sentences.eng_trans: I went shopping at [in] the department store yesterday./I went to the department store to do some [the] shopping yesterday.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: きのうデパートへ買い物に行きました

example_sentences.eng_trans: He has gone to London now./He is (away) in London now.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は今ロンドンに行っています

example_sentences.eng_trans: I have been to Kyushu, but (I have) never been to Shikoku.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 私は九州には行ったことがあるが,四国へは行ったことがない

example_sentences.eng_trans: Which road shall we take?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: どちらの道を行きましょうか

example_sentences.eng_trans: “Would you like to come over for a cup of tea?”“OK. I'll be right over.”
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 「お茶に来ない？」 「うん,すぐ行くよ」

example_sentences.eng_trans: “I'm going to meet Mary.”“Can I come too?”“I'd love you to come.”
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 「メアリーを迎えに行くところなの」 「私も行っていいかしら」 「あなたが行ってくださればうれしいわ」

example_sentences.eng_trans: “Where have you been?”“I have been to Narita Airport to see my friend off.”
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 「どこへ行っていたのですか」 「友達を見送りに成田空港に行っていたの」

example_sentences.eng_trans: Everything went well./Everything came [turned] out all right.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 何もかもうまく行った

example_sentences.eng_trans: Things don't always go as smooth(ly) [well] as we might expect.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 物事はそう思うようにはうまくいかないものだ

example_sentences.eng_trans: He seems to have done well [have been successful] in the entrance exam.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼の入学試験はうまくいったようだ

example_sentences.eng_trans: Are you getting along [on] (well) with your work?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 仕事はうまくいっていますか

example_sentences.eng_trans: I bought some flowers on my [the] way to the hospital.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 病院へ行く途中で花を買った

example_sentences.eng_trans: I found it difficult to cover [make, do] the distance in three hours.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: その距離を3時間で行くのは大変だった

example_sentences.eng_trans: He sent his sister around to the shop for some cigarettes.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は妹に店にたばこを買いに行かせた

example_sentences.eng_trans: A patrol car is running up and down (in) [to and fro in] the street.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: パトカーが道を行ったり来たりしている

example_sentences.eng_trans: What has become of my watch?
example_sentences.jap_sentence: ぼくの時計はどこへ行ったのか（＝どうなったのか）

example_sentences.eng_trans: Everything he did fell short of his expectations.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼のすることすべてが思いどおりいかなかった

example_sentences.eng_trans: “They all got it wrong.”“Well, Taro came close.”
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 「彼らはみんなそれを間違ったんだよ」 「でも太郎はもう少しってところまでいったんだよ」
